speaker: GOWER
text: Nay, that’s right. But why wear you your leek

speaker: GOWER
text: today? Saint Davy’s day is past.

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: There is occasions and causes why and

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: wherefore in all things. I will tell you ass my

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: friend, Captain Gower. The rascally, scald, beggarly,

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: lousy, pragging knave Pistol, which you and

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: yourself and all the world know to be no petter than

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: a fellow, look you now, of no merits, he is come to

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: me and prings me pread and salt yesterday, look

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: you, and bid me eat my leek. It was in a place where

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: I could not breed no contention with him, but I will

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: be so bold as to wear it in my cap till I see him once

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: again, and then I will tell him a little piece of my

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: desires.

speaker: GOWER
text: Why here he comes, swelling like a

speaker: GOWER
text: turkey-cock.

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: ’Tis no matter for his swellings, nor his

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: turkey-cocks.—God pless you, Aunchient Pistol,

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: you scurvy, lousy knave, God pless you.

speaker: PISTOL
text: Ha, art thou bedlam? Dost thou thirst, base

speaker: PISTOL
text: Trojan, to have me fold up Parca’s fatal web? Hence.

speaker: PISTOL
text: I am qualmish at the smell of leek.

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: I peseech you heartily, scurvy, lousy knave,

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: at my desires and my requests and my petitions, to

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: eat, look you, this leek. Because, look you, you do

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: not love it, nor your affections and your appetites

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: and your disgestions does not agree with it, I would

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: desire you to eat it.

speaker: PISTOL
text: Not for Cadwallader and all his goats.

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: There is one goat for you.

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: Will you be so good, scald knave,

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: as eat it?

speaker: PISTOL
text: Base Trojan, thou shalt die.

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: You say very true, scald knave, when God’s

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: will is. I will desire you to live in the meantime and

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: eat your victuals. Come, there is sauce for it.

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: You called me yesterday “mountain squire,”

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: but I will make you today a squire of low degree. I

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: pray you, fall to. If you can mock a leek, you can eat

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: a leek.

speaker: GOWER
text: Enough, captain. You have astonished him.

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: I say I will make him eat some part of my

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: leek, or I will peat his pate four days.—Bite, I pray

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: you. It is good for your green wound and your

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: ploody coxcomb.

speaker: PISTOL
text: Must I bite?

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: Yes, certainly, and out of doubt and out of

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: question, too, and ambiguities.

speaker: PISTOL
text: By this leek, I will most horribly revenge.

speaker: PISTOL
text:
Fluellen
                 
                threatens
                 
                him
                .
               I eat and eat, I swear—

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: Eat, I pray you. Will you have some more

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: sauce to your leek? There is not enough leek to

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: swear by.

speaker: PISTOL
text: Quiet thy cudgel. Thou dost see I eat.

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: Much good do you, scald knave, heartily.

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: Nay, pray you throw none away. The skin is good for

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: your broken coxcomb. When you take occasions to

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: see leeks hereafter, I pray you mock at ’em, that is

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: all.

speaker: PISTOL
text: Good.

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: Ay, leeks is good. Hold you, there is a groat

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: to heal your pate.

speaker: PISTOL
text: Me, a groat?

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: Yes, verily, and in truth you shall take it, or I

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: have another leek in my pocket, which you shall

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: eat.

speaker: PISTOL
text: I take thy groat in earnest of revenge.

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: If I owe you anything, I will pay you in

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: cudgels. You shall be a woodmonger and buy

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: nothing of me but cudgels. God be wi’ you and

speaker: FLUELLEN
text: keep you and heal your pate.

speaker: PISTOL
text: All hell shall stir for this.

speaker: GOWER
text: Go, go. You are a counterfeit cowardly knave.

speaker: GOWER
text: Will you mock at an ancient tradition begun upon

speaker: GOWER
text: an honorable respect and worn as a memorable

speaker: GOWER
text: trophy of predeceased valor, and dare not avouch in

speaker: GOWER
text: your deeds any of your words? I have seen you

speaker: GOWER
text: gleeking and galling at this gentleman twice or

speaker: GOWER
text: thrice. You thought because he could not speak

speaker: GOWER
text: English in the native garb, he could not therefore

speaker: GOWER
text: handle an English cudgel. You find it otherwise, and

speaker: GOWER
text: henceforth let a Welsh correction teach you a good

speaker: GOWER
text: English condition. Fare you well.

speaker: PISTOL
text: Doth Fortune play the huswife with me now?

speaker: PISTOL
text: News have I that my Doll is dead i’ th’ spital of a

speaker: PISTOL
text: malady of France, and there my rendezvous is quite

speaker: PISTOL
text: cut off. Old I do wax, and from my weary limbs

speaker: PISTOL
text: honor is cudgeled. Well, bawd I’ll turn, and something

speaker: PISTOL
text: lean to cutpurse of quick hand. To England

speaker: PISTOL
text: will I steal, and there I’ll steal.

speaker: PISTOL
text:
And
               
              patches
               
              will
               
              I
               
              get
               
              unto
               
              these
               
              cudgeled
               
              scars
              ,

speaker: PISTOL
text:
And
               
              swear
               
              I
               
              got
               
              them
               
              in
               
              the
               
              Gallia
               
              wars
              .
